# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="4df17-102">Isključite fokusiran prij</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4df17-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="4df17-103">Na vrhu stranice, izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4df17-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4df17-104">da biste otvorili okno postavki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4df17-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="4df17-105">U oknu postavke postavite preklopnik u **Poštanskom sandučetu fokusirana** na "Isključeno".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4df17-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4df17-106">Više informacija potražite u odeljku [isključite fokusiran prij](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4df17-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy#bkmk_outlookcom).</span></span>
